#include <stdio.h>
// THIS IS GOPR......
int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{

    int t,h1,m1,s1,h2,m2,s2,diff;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d",&h1,&m1,&s1);
        scanf("%d%d%d",&h2,&m2,&s2);
        s1+=(m1*60)+(h1*3600);
        s2+=(m2*60)+(h2*3600);
        diff=(s2-s1)%400;
        if(diff<=99||(diff>=200&&diff<=299))
            printf("S\n");
        else
            printf("C\n");
        
    }
    return 0;
}
